src:
Kiparka in lesarka sta umetniški mizarki
Nina Koželj in Manca Kemperl izdelujeta unikatne omarice in predalnike. Razstavljali že na Danskem, nagrajeni v Sloveniji.
07 Nov 2019, 16:48 by Jaroslav Jankovič



Nina in Manca s pasjo druščino FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič



Nina ob predalniku z usnjenimi jezički FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič



Z orehovim plohom na cirkularju FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič



Motiv z volkom FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič



Podoba zaljubljencev, motiv za vrata omarice za vino FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič



Predalnik FOTO: Arhiv Vulgaris Woodcut



Volk in ženska FOTO: Arhiv Vulgaris Woodcut


»Zakaj je škatla rdeče zarobljena, zakitani robovi?« sem nevedno vprašal dekleti, ti sta se za trenutek nezaupljivo pogledali, nato pa je črnolasa 34-letna kiparka Nina Koželj pojasnila, da bo rdeča črta ostala. »Vidite, na tem izdelku je črna, tako kot odtisnjena podoba na frontih,« je dodala 40-letna Manca Kemperl.Prva, kot rečeno, kiparka, druga inženirka lesarstva sta združili moči v nekdanji mizarski delavnici Mančinega očeta v Zgornjih Stranjah pri Kamniku in jo preuredili v mizarski atelje.


Motiv z volkom FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič

Veliko dvorišče varujejo dva češka volčjaka in črno-beli mešanec, ki v prišleku najprej vzbudijo nekaj strahu, a se je izkazalo, da so le radovedni, hkrati pa zgledno ubogljivi. Za uvodni posnetek so skočili v prtljažnik in se lepo posedli v vrsto zbor.
Srečali sta se po naključju
Mizar nam naredi mizico, izreže in poobla ter spolira lično poličko za na steno, nam zreže in sestavi kuhinjo. Mizar je obrtnik, ki zna natančno odrezati in pod točno želenim kotom zabiti žebljiček v les. In to tako, da ne bo počil.Kemperletova nam je priznala, da se je kot otrok včasih potikala po očetovi delavnici, a da to ni bilo odločilno, da se je pozneje vpisala na srednjo lesarsko šolo, kjer jo je les v resnici popolnoma prevzel. Nadaljevala je študij na lesarski fakulteti, hkrati pa jo je zamikalo, da bi kaj ustvarila s svojimi rokami.»Poti so se nama prekrižale po naključju, ko je mama potrebovala kuhinjo in sem ji rekla, da je tam nekje v Zgornjih Stranjah menda ena mizarka. Pa sem šla z njo,« je povedala Koželjeva.Ideja je sledila ideji in cirkularji in brusi v delavnici so zapeli.


Podoba zaljubljencev, motiv za vrata omarice za vino FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič

»Želeli sva izdelati pohištvo, ki bi bilo več kot le dobro oblikovano. Želeli sva mu dodati del svojih dlani,« pove Nina in poprime lep orehov ploh, ki ga je z drugega konca delavnice prinesla Manca. Skupaj sta ga položili na mizo s cirkularjem. Zanimivo, kako hitro, popolnoma spontano sta si pred zagonom žage nataknili zaščitna očala in protihrupne naušnike.Svoje unikatne omarice in predalnike izdelujeta in predstavljata pod blagovno znamko Vulgaris Woodcut, kar bi lahko prevedli preprosti ali prvinski lesorez. Izdelki so ustvarjeni v minimalističnem slogu, v ravnih, gladkih linijah. Po obliki so na prvi pogled malce podobni danes vintage omaricam, ki jih lahko še vidimo pri babici, ki ni menjala pohištva od svoje poroke.
Najprej je skica za grafiko
Seveda pa gresta Manca in Nina dlje od opisanega. Fronte pa so nekaj posebnega.»Pravzaprav se vsak predalnik začne s skico grafike, ki bo krasila vrata. Nato naredimo lesorez, ki se ga ročno, z navadno žlico, tako kot smo nekoč počeli v šoli, odtisne na papir v petih izvodih. Nato leseno ploščo z motivom vgradiva v omarico kot fronto.«Motivi grafičnih podob so starožitni, volk in golo dekle, dojke, serija dojk, narisanih v kamenodobni, jamski maniri.Da dekleti nista od muh, govori dejstvo, da so ju maja letos povabili na razstavo 3daysofdesign v København, ki je


Nina ob predalniku z usnjenimi jezički FOTO: Jaroslav Jankovič

najpomembnejši razstavno-prodajni dogodek oblikovanja na Danskem. Skoraj ni mogoče sodelovati na prestižnejšem oblikovalskem sejmu.Koželjeva in Kemperlova sta kolekcijo izdelkov Vulgaris prvič pokazali javnosti lani. Prejeli sta posebno nagrado na prireditvi Čar lesa v Cankarjevem domu in nagrado top5 na sejmu pohištva Ambient na Gospodarskem razstavišču.Mizarski atelje je tudi v svetu prava redkost. Izdelati lično omarico ali predalnik z umetniškim vtisom pa je nekaj povsem drugega kot postaviti moderno instalacijo za razstavo, kjer je precej več svobode. Omarico in predalnik je treba najprej izrezati in zbiti skupaj po mizarskih zakonitostih, se pravi, da je treba stvar najprej obrtniško obvladati do popolnosti.


Volk in ženska FOTO: Arhiv Vulgaris Woodcut

Umetnici trenutno pripravljata bife za vina z motivom zaljubljencev na fronti. Podoba bo v rdečem.
2018.sta predstavili kolekcijo Vulgaris.
text:
The sculptor and the woodworker are art joiners
Nina Kozelj and Manca Kemperl make unique cabinets and drawers. Exhibited in Denmark, awarded in Slovenia.
07 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Jaroslav Jankovic



Nina and Manca with a Dog Family PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic



Nina next to the drawer with leather tabs PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic



With a walnut plot on a circular saw PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic



A wolf motif PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic



The image of lovers, the motif behind the wine cabinet door PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic



Drawer PHOTO: Vulgaris Woodcut Archive



The wolf and the woman PHOTO: Vulgaris Woodcut Archive


“Why is the box red-edged, the curved edges?” I asked the girls unwillingly, looking at each other for a moment, and then the black-haired 34-year-old sculptor Nina Kozelj explained that the red line would remain. "You see, this product is black, just like the imprint on the front," added 40-year-old Manca Kemperl. remodeled it into a carpentry studio.


A wolf motif PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic

The large courtyard is guarded by two Czech wolves and a mixture of black and white, which at first evoke some fear in the new arrival, but have proved to be only curious and at the same time exemplary obedient. For the opening shot, they jumped in the trunk and sat down nicely in a row of choirs.
They met by accident
The carpenter makes us a table, cuts and powers it, and polishes a personal shelf for the wall, cuts us and assembles the kitchen. A carpenter is a craftsman who knows how to cut and pin a nail into the wood at exactly the desired angle. Kemperlet confessed to her that she used to go to her father's workshop as a child, but that it was not decisive that she later enrolled at a high school in woodworking, where she was completely taken over by wood. . She continued her studies at the Faculty of Woodworking, and was tempted to create something with her own hands. "The paths were crossed by accident when my mother needed a kitchen and I told her that there was probably a carpenter somewhere in Upper Stories. . But I went with her, "Kozelj said. The idea followed the idea and the circular saws and brushes in the workshop were sung.


The image of lovers, the motif behind the wine cabinet door PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic

“We wanted to make furniture that would be more than well designed. We wanted to add a part of our palms to it, "Nina says, taking the nice walnut plate that Manca brought from the other end of the workshop. Together they laid him on a table with a circular saw. It is interesting how quickly, completely spontaneously, they put on safety glasses and noise-canceling earphones before starting the saw. Their unique cabinets and drawers are manufactured and presented under the Vulgaris Woodcut brand, which could be translated as simple or original woodcut. The products are created in a minimalist style, in straight, smooth lines. In appearance, they look a bit like vintage cabinets today, which can still be seen with a grandmother who has not changed furniture since her wedding.
First is the sketch for the graphic
Of course, Manca and Nino go beyond what is described. The fronts are something special. ”In fact, each drawer begins with a sketch of the graphic that will adorn the door. Then we make a woodcut that is hand-printed with five tablespoons, just like we used to do in school. Then we put a wooden board with the motif in the cabinet as a front. ”The motifs of the graphic images are ancient, wolf and naked girl, breast, a series of breasts drawn in stone-age, cave-like manner. to the 3daysofdesign exhibition in Copenhagen, which


Nina next to the drawer with leather tabs PHOTO: Jaroslav Jankovic

the most important design exhibition in Denmark. It is almost impossible to participate in a more prestigious design fair. Kozelev and Kemperlov first showed the Vulgaris product collection to the public last year. They received a special award at the Charm of Wood event at Cankarjev dom and a top5 award at the Ambient Furniture Fair at the Exhibition and Convention Center. A carpenter's atelier is also a rarity in the world. Creating a personal cabinet or drawer with an artistic impression is something other than setting up a modern installation for an exhibition where there is much more freedom. The cabinet and drawer must first be cut and stitched together according to the joinery rules, that is, the thing must first be mastered to perfection.


The wolf and the woman PHOTO: Vulgaris Woodcut Archive

The artists are currently preparing a buffet for wine lovers on the front. The image will be in red.
2018th you presented the Vulgaris collection.
